Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
            ThisItem.Task,
            "GetUserProfile", Collect(col_Results, { ID: ThisItem.ID, Data: col_Profile }),
            "FetchOrders", Collect(col_Results, { ID: ThisItem.ID, Data: col_Orders }),
            "RetrieveNotifications", Collect(col_Results, { ID: ThisItem.ID, Data: col_Messages })
          )
